Privacy breach: Banking Ombudsman Scheme sends highly sensitive details about $300k scam victim to wrong email address https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/privacy-breach-banking-ombudsman-scheme-sends-highly-sensitive-details-about-300k-scam-victim-to-wrong-email-address/CGSGX2QXBRB45IYSAHEUW457EE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/privacy-breach-banking-ombudsman-scheme-sends-highly-sensitive-details-about-300k-scam-victim-to-wrong-email-address/CGSGX2QXBRB45IYSAHEUW457EE/ 'What a bunch of idiots... How am I supposed to have any trust in the system?' Sun, 09 Jun 2024 17:00:00 +0000 The victim lost $300,000 in a scam. Now, sensitive details about her case have been sent to a third party in a serious privacy breach involving the Banking Ombudsman's office. Photo / Dean Purcell
Coroner critical of Spectrum Care after woman left unchecked for two days, found dead in bed https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/dead-intellectually-disabled-woman-left-unchecked-in-bed-for-two-days/YUM3LGJXQNDO3FE623QGHNTHKI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/dead-intellectually-disabled-woman-left-unchecked-in-bed-for-two-days/YUM3LGJXQNDO3FE623QGHNTHKI/ Catherine HuttonCare staff feared the 30-year-old might act aggressively so they left her alone. Photo / Supplied
